amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, $2,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Army for the development of Portable Mobile Emergency Broadband Systems (MEBS).

vote.text: Amendment SA 809 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 809 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S6896; text: CR S6896) To make available, with an offset, $2,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Army for the development of Portable Mobile Emergency Broadband Systems (MEBS).
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 809 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 809 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
